metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4053 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A website could have obscured the full screen notification by using a URLwith a scheme handled by an external program, such as a mailto URL. Thiscould have led to user confusion and possible spoofing attacks. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 116, Firefox ESR < 115.2, and Thunderbird <115.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
